title: S3 Ep10: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 6 – Cold Case Politics
itunes:title: S3, The State v. Dennis Perry - Addendum 6 – Cold Case Politics
description:
August 16, 2018 / Jon Cryer hosts this week's addendum with Susan, Rabia, and guest panelist Stephen Janis of The Land of the Unsolved podcast to discuss Episode 6 of the State v. Dennis Perry case.

Episode scoring music by Animal Weapon and Blue Dot Sessions.

Today’s Addendum is sponsored by SquareSpace.

Go to www.SquareSpace.com/UNDISCLOSED for a free trial and use offer code UNDISCLOSED to save 10% off your first purchase of a website or domain.
